participant_1.background:
I like to wear clothes that make me feel confident and look good.
i decided to publish my creations on internet.
i have not had to work a day in my life.
I checked my pulse multiple times a day to make sure I'm not dying.
I wear contacts now.

participant_2.background:
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.
i m a shy person but i love to sing.
I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
I am not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay.
i am 77 years old.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! I just decided to publish my creations on the internet.
Oh wow! That's awesome! What kind of creations?
I have been making clothes for a while now, and I decided to share them with the world.
That's great! I love to make clothes too. I used to dye my hair a lot, but now I keep it natural.
I think natural is beautiful! I used to dye my hair, but I stopped because it was too much work.
I'm glad you think so! I'm also shy, but I love to sing. I've been married for 15 years, but I still trip over my own feet sometimes.
That's funny! I'm not shy at all, but I can't sing to save my life. I'm glad to hear that you're happy in your marriage.
Thank you! I am very happy. I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I'm not going to let that stop me from being who I am.
That's great! You should be proud of who you are. I'm sure your family will love you no matter what.
